keywords: ['opera song', 'female voice', 'high pitch', 'no percussion', 'shimmering background sound', 'wind sound', 'slow tempo', 'no other instruments', 'epic sound', 'sound of victory']
caption: This opera song features a female voice singing at a high pitch. This is accompanied by a shimmering background sound for one bar. This is followed by the sound of wind. This song has a victorious mood. This song can be played at the end of a war scene for the victor of the war.
